channel.title: Nssd on Tristan Berchoux
channel.description: Recent content in Nssd on Tristan Berchoux

item.title: Not So Standard Deviations: The Podcast
item.description: I’m happy to announce that I’ve started a brand new podcast called Not So Standard Deviations with Hilary Parker at Etsy. Episode 1 “RCatLadies Origin Story” is available through SoundCloud. In this episode we talk about the origins of RCatLadies, evidence-based data analysis, my new book, and the Python vs. R debate. You can subscribe to the podcast usingÂ the RSS feed from SoundCloud. We’ll be getting it up on iTunes hopefully very soon.
